Global Settings
 are accessed through the 
Configuration Menu
 > Global Settings
 The 
Global Settings
 page contains key global settings in a set of sections.
 This 
menu
 and related tabs are only available to 
system administrators
.
 There is a 
search
 feature to search all available links on global settings
The page is organized into various tabs, each with sub-sections:
Tab Name
Sub-section
Description

System Configuration
How the system should be customized to your specific business needs, including system-wide variables and all custom fields (including those in UTAs)
